meanings.definition: To assemble or set up equipment or machinery
meanings.sent1: Dad will rig the tent for our camping trip.
meanings.sent2: The workers will rig the stage for the concert.
meanings.sent3: Tom tried to rig the game of hide and seek by hiding in the same spot every time.
meanings.sent4: She managed to rig the puzzle pieces together in a way that they didn't fit.
meanings.sent5: The mechanic showed me how to rig the engine so it would start smoothly.

meanings.sent1: The rig carried heavy logs from the forest.
meanings.sent2: The oil rig parked outside the factory was massive.
meanings.sent3: The circus clown drove the colorful rig around the ring, making everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The rig rumbled down the highway like a giant metal beast.
meanings.sent5: The delivery rig arrived just in time with all the supplies we needed.

meanings.sent1: The magician's rig amazed the audience with its illusions.
meanings.sent2: She saw through his rig and refused to be fooled.
meanings.sent3: The kids came up with a clever rig to get extra candy on Halloween.
meanings.sent4: His rig to win the race involved a secret shortcut through the woods.
meanings.sent5: The elaborate rig to prank their teacher involved fake spiders and hidden cameras.

meanings.sent1: The con artist tried to rig the card game in his favor.
meanings.sent2: She suspected someone was rigging the competition results.
meanings.sent3: The students tried to rig the test by passing notes with answers.
meanings.sent4: He managed to rig the election by bribing voters.
meanings.sent5: The chef was caught trying to rig the cooking contest by sneaking in pre-made dishes.

meanings.definition: A set of clothing or equipment for a particular activity
meanings.sent1: The scuba diver put on his rig before diving into the ocean.
meanings.sent2: The astronaut's rig included a spacesuit and oxygen tank.
meanings.sent3: The detective's rig had all the tools needed to solve the mystery.
meanings.sent4: Her hiking rig consisted of sturdy boots and a backpack.
meanings.sent5: The firefighter's rig was heavy with gear but essential for saving lives.
